title: Jammed Weapon
description: It won’t fix itself! Either spend all your Stamina unjamming it or spend 5 Stamina to drop it and draw a different weapon.

title: Slipped
description: You step on something slippery. Test DEX or be Knocked Down.

title: Dropped Weapon
description: Your weapon slips from your sweaty hands. Spend 5 Stamina to either recover it or draw a different weapon.

title: Loss of Confidence
description: Now that you think about it, this is not looking good. Reduce your Initiative by 2.

title: Panic Attack
description: Test WIL or reduce your Combat skills by 2 for this encounter.

title: Shattered
description: Instead of firing, your weapon blows up in your hands. You are unscathed but your weapon is scrap.

title: Exposed
description: You step to the wrong side, leaving yourself exposed. All enemies targeting you get a free attack.

title: Unguarded
description: You are fighting recklessly. You cannot spend Stamina on defensive maneuvers for the rest of this encounter.

title: Exhausted
description: The fight’s weight suddenly overwhelms you. Roll Recovery Checks with disadvantage for this encounter.

title: Bad Luck
description: In a twist of fate you not only miss your target, but the bullet ricochets and hits you. Roll for damage as normal.
